home.meta_title: Shift at Midnight - A Terrifying Night Shift at a 90s Gas Station
home.meta_description: Step into the immersive world of Shift at Midnight, where every visitor might be a doppelganger in this thrilling horror gaming experience.

latest_codes.title: Latest Cookie Clicker Updates
latest_codes.code1: New Building: Fractal Engine - Produces cookies through dimensional manipulation.
latest_codes.code2: New Achievement: Cookie Singularity - Reach 1 quintillion cookies per second.
latest_codes.update_note: Stay updated with the latest Cookie Clicker features by bookmarking this page!

download.title: Download
download.installation_steps: Download the file, extract the ZIP archive, and place all contents in a folder of your choice (such as desktop). Then run "ShiftAtMidnight.exe".
download.installation_note: After launching, you may receive a notification that this is an unrecognized app; you should continue anyway. Click on "More info" and then click on "Run anyway". If you don't trust me, I recommend deleting the file.

how_to_redeem.title: How to Use Cookie Clicker Features
how_to_redeem.intro: Maximizing your cookie production is simple. Follow these steps:
how_to_redeem.step1: Start by clicking the big cookie.
how_to_redeem.note: Remember to check for Golden Cookies regularly for bonus effects.

tips.title: Tips for Cookie Clicker Success
tips.tip1: Always watch for Golden Cookies appearing.
tips.tip2: Invest in the most efficient buildings first.
tips.tip3: Use the Stock Market during Frenzy effects.
tips.conclusion: With these tips, you'll be a cookie master in no time!

cookie_clicker.title: Shift at Midnight
cookie_clicker.subtitle: A Terrifying Night Shift at a 90s Gas Station
cookie_clicker.description: Step into the immersive world of Shift at Midnight, where every visitor might be a doppelganger.

features.title: Unleash the Power of Shift at Midnight
features.subtitle: Experience survival horror with these terrifying features

item1.title: Interrogate Doppelgangers
item1.description: Serve customers, ask probing questions, verify IDs and behavior to identify imposters and protect your station.

item2.title: Board Up & Survive
item2.description: When creatures slip through the night, barricade doors, set traps, and choose whether to hide or confront lurking threats.

item3.title: Co‑op Horror Tension
item3.description: Play solo or team up with 1–3 players to manage the graveyard shift at a 90s‑era gas station packed with stress.

item4.title: Rogue‑Like & Replayable
item4.description: Each session offers randomized NPCs, events, weapons, upgrades, traps, and enemy types—never the same night twice.

abilities.title: Master Your Skills in Shift at Midnight
abilities.subtitle: Discover and master essential survival abilities

item1.title: Quick Interrogation
item1.description: Ask questions quickly and decisively—time is against you when spotting imposters.

item2.title: Strategic Barricading
item2.description: Know when to board up doors or conserve resources based on threat intensity.

item3.title: Team Coordination
item3.description: Assign roles: one asks questions, another handles barricades, and others scout or trap.

item4.title: Situation Awareness
item4.description: Listen for audio cues, monitor the store layout, and adapt as imposters evolve.

item5.title: Resource Management
item5.description: Track supplies carefully—many upgrades are limited and vital for late-night survival.

item6.title: Adaptive Strategy
item6.description: Randomized events force you to pivot tactics every run—stay alert and creative.

cta.title: Ready to Join the Adventure?
cta.description: Step into the immersive world of Hapunan and experience the thrill of strategic gaming. Start your journey today!

item1.question: How do I start playing?
item1.answer: Download the demo on Itch.io or wishlist it on Steam, then click "Start Playing" to begin your first night.

item2.question: Is Shift at Midnight free?
item2.answer: Yes, the demo on Itch.io is free. The full version will be paid and available on Steam.

item3.question: Can I play with friends?
item3.answer: Definitely! Co‑op supports 1–3 players working together to survive the night shift.

item4.question: What platforms is it on?
item4.answer: The game is currently on PC via Itch.io and coming soon to Steam; Mac support is planned.

item5.question: How do I improve my skills?
item5.answer: Practice running efficient interrogations, manage barricades smartly, and adapt to each night's challenges.

reviews.title: Player Reviews
reviews.subtitle: See what players are saying about Shift at Midnight

items.title: Atmospheric Horror
items.content: Shift at Midnight's atmosphere is genuinely terrifying. The 90s gas station setting and the constant fear of doppelgangers create an incredibly immersive and unsettling experience.
items.author: - Horror Game Fan

items.title: Unique Gameplay Mechanics
items.content: Shift at Midnight's doppelganger mechanic is brilliant! Having to verify customers' identities while managing the gas station adds a whole new level of psychological horror.
items.author: - Survival Horror Enthusiast

items.title: Visual Design
items.content: Shift at Midnight perfectly executes its retro 90s aesthetic. The way shadows and lighting work in the gas station creates genuine tension and fear.
items.author: - Art Critic

items.title: Psychological Horror
items.content: Shift at Midnight masters psychological horror. The constant paranoia about identifying doppelgangers during your night shift is mentally exhausting - in the best way possible.
items.author: - Psychology Student

items.title: Beginner Friendly
items.content: While Shift at Midnight is intensely scary, the tutorial shift eases you into the gas station mechanics well. Perfect balance of teaching and tension.
items.author: - New Player

items.title: Survival Mechanics
items.content: Shift at Midnight's resource management and survival aspects are well balanced. Every decision during your night shift feels meaningful and potentially deadly.
items.author: - Survival Game Veteran

items.title: Supportive Community
items.content: The Shift at Midnight community is incredibly helpful with sharing gas station survival tips and doppelganger detection strategies. Great place for new night shift workers!
items.author: - Community Member

items.title: Content Updates
items.content: The developers keep adding new threats to Shift at Midnight. Each update brings fresh nightmares and challenges to your gas station night shift.
items.author: - Long-time Player

items.title: Character Customization
items.content: Shift at Midnight lets you customize your night shift worker perfectly. The personal touches make surviving the doppelganger encounters feel more intense.
items.author: - Creative Player

items.title: Technical Performance
items.content: Shift at Midnight runs flawlessly even during intense doppelganger encounters. The gas station's security systems and mechanics are perfectly optimized.
items.author: - Tech Enthusiast

items.title: Sound Design
items.content: Shift at Midnight's audio design is terrifying. Every footstep and door creak in the gas station puts you on edge, especially during the midnight hours.
items.author: - Audio Engineer

items.title: Challenge Modes
items.content: Shift at Midnight's different difficulty levels keep the game fresh. Each night shift can be a completely different nightmare with unique doppelganger behaviors.
items.author: - Hardcore Gamer

items.title: Co-op Horror
items.content: Playing Shift at Midnight with friends is intense. Managing the gas station together while questioning each other's identity creates unique social horror.
items.author: - Co-op Player

items.title: Genre Innovation
items.content: Shift at Midnight revolutionizes survival horror. The 90s gas station setting and intricate doppelganger mechanics are truly unique in the genre.
items.author: - Horror Genre Fan

items.title: Progression System
items.content: Shift at Midnight's upgrade system is rewarding. Each survived night shift brings valuable security upgrades and new tools for the gas station.
items.author: - Progress Hunter

items.title: Gas Station Layout
items.content: Shift at Midnight's gas station layout is perfectly designed for horror. Every corner and shadow could hide a terrifying doppelganger encounter.
items.author: - Level Design Fan

items.title: Multiplayer Integration
items.content: Shift at Midnight's multiplayer features work seamlessly. Finding and joining other night shift workers is easy and enhances the horror experience.
items.author: - Multiplayer Fan

items.title: Replayability
items.content: Shift at Midnight offers incredible replay value. Each night shift brings randomized events and multiple endings - no two shifts are ever the same.
items.author: - Dedicated Player

items.title: Enemy Design
items.content: Shift at Midnight's doppelgangers are terrifyingly well-designed. Each type of imposter has unique and unsettling behaviors during the night shift.
items.author: - Monster Design Fan

items.title: Advanced Mechanics
items.content: Shift at Midnight's survival and detection systems are complex and satisfying. Mastering the gas station's security features is a rewarding challenge.
items.author: - Expert Player

items.title: Interface Design
items.content: Shift at Midnight's retro security interface is brilliant. Managing the gas station's systems feels authentically 90s and adds to the atmosphere.
items.author: - UI Designer

items.title: Hidden Content
items.content: Shift at Midnight is full of secrets. Each night shift can reveal new hidden lore about the gas station and its mysterious doppelganger phenomenon.
items.author: - Secret Hunter

items.title: Streaming Experience
items.content: Shift at Midnight is perfect for streaming. Watching others manage their night shifts and react to doppelgangers is incredibly entertaining.
items.author: - Content Creator

items.title: Game Stability
items.content: Shift at Midnight runs stable even during intense encounters. The multiplayer gas station experience is smooth and reliable at all hours.
items.author: - Technical Player
